org.jikesrvm.compilers.opt.regalloc

Class IntervalAnalysis

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jikesrvm.compilers.opt.driver.CompilerPhase
      • org.jikesrvm.compilers.opt.regalloc.IntervalAnalysis

  • public final class IntervalAnalysis
extends CompilerPhase
    phase to compute linear scan intervals.

      • perform

        public void perform(IR ir)
        compute live intervals for this ir the result is a sorted (by beginning point) set of compound intervals, stored in the private 'intervals' field.
        Specified by:
        perform in class CompilerPhase
        Parameters:
        ir - the ir

      • createTopAndReverseList

        private void createTopAndReverseList(ControlFlowGraph cfg)
        create topological list and a reverse topological list the results are on listOfBlocks and reverseTopFirst lists
        Parameters:
        cfg - the control flow graph

      • assignDepthFirstNumbers

        void assignDepthFirstNumbers(ControlFlowGraph cfg)
        this method processes all basic blocks, do the following to each block 1) add it to the begining of the "listOfBlocks" list 2) number the instructions 3) process the instructions that restrict physical register assignment
        Parameters:
        cfg - the control flow graph

      • initializeRegisters

        private void initializeRegisters()
        Initialize the interval for each register to null.

      • mutateFMOVs

        private boolean mutateFMOVs(LiveIntervalElement live,
                            Register register,
                            int dfnbegin,
                            int dfnend)
        Mutate FMOVs that end live ranges
        Parameters:
        live - The live interval for a basic block/reg pair
        register - The register for this live interval
        dfnbegin - The (adjusted) begin for this interval
        dfnend - The (adjusted) end for this interval
        Returns:
        whether an actual change was necessary (as opposed to simple removal because the end was dead)

      • processLiveInterval

        private CompoundInterval processLiveInterval(LiveIntervalElement live,
                                             BasicBlock bb)
        for each live interval associated with this block we either add a new interval, or extend a previous interval if it is contiguous
        Parameters:
        live - the liveintervalelement for a basic block/reg pair
        bb - the basic block
        Returns:
        the resulting CompoundInterval. null if the live interval is not relevant to register allocation.
